about_the_game:
Become a futanari and have lovey-dovey healing time with 3-player play.

Become a futanari online and have naughty fun.
You can have a naughty experience anonymously and casually.

Gender, age is over adult, any nationality. Usernames should be unrelated to reality.
Anyone can easily get started.
It is buy-in and there are no usage fees online.

Gameplay.

Room-scale, realistic play.
No analog sticks to control your character.
When the player's head is aligned with the head of the character being controlled, the character and the player's head are linked,
The character moves in accordance with the player's head movements.
If the player's head moves away from the character's head, the link is broken.
In this state, the player can view the scene from a third-person perspective.

Play by moving the scene freely
To be able to move the scene at any time with the analog stick,
This allows the player to enjoy the game without moving his or her body.
The scene can also be moved back to a set position with a single button.

Simulated sex is possible by simply shaking the controller.
When you shake the controller, your character moves,
The player has the character stimulated by that movement,
VR controllers and electric toys move in tandem.
(The electric toy function is currently only available on PCs and has been tested on The handy and A10 Cyclone SA)

Simple conversations can be held in a selective way.
If it is a supported language, it will be displayed in the other party's language.　
Play has no borders.

It is very easy to decide which position to do next, online.
Once play begins, the remaining time is displayed. When the time runs out, the mode changes to voting for the next position.
There are several different positions, and players vote on what they want to play next, and the best position is automatically determined.
Players can decide what they want to play with their partner without any communication.

Kissing is also easy.
When you stick out your tongue with the tongue button, ask the other player to stick out their tongue as well.
Your tongue, which is visible on the screen, is linked to the position of the character's tongue.
You can intertwine each other's tongues using physics calculations.

You can play in offline play.
Characters other than yourself are controlled by Bot.
You can choose your favorite position to play.

Operation Method.

[ when adjusting position ]
Move with the analog stick
Press the analog stick while holding down the trigger.
Turn and move up and down.

[ System menu ].
Press and hold the menu button to display.

[Shortcuts to dialogues ]
With no menu open, tilt the analog stick
Tilt the analog stick.
You can access some lines.

[ Mini-Menu ]
Displayed by pressing the menu button
To open the desired mini-menu with a single button
Press and hold the menu button while opening the mini-menu you wish to open.
The page will be registered to the menu button.
To cancel, press and hold the corresponding menu button with the Mini-Menu open.

This software has been developed and tested with MetaQuest3 (Oculus Link).
　Operation may differ on other VR devices.

About the operation.

* PCVR
Meta Quest 2(OculusLink) Operation has been confirmed on actual devices.
Meta Quest 3(OculusLink) Operation has been confirmed on actual device.

We have not confirmed that it works in other environments,
We would appreciate it if you could check it by playing the Demo version.

content_descriptors.notes:
Of an adult person with male and female genitalia,
Consensual sexual intercourse

name: Just Futanari 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • VR Support: MetaQuest2(OculusLink,VirtualDesktop) , MetaQuest3(OculusLink,VirtualDesktop)
